law.catch_line: Display of danger signs on oil storage facilities.
law.text: The well operator shall cause signs printed with the word "DANGER" and other information which may be required by the department to be prominently displayed near or on all facilities used for storage of oil whether the facilities are in active production or have been abandoned.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994.
